settings.question: How does the HOK Squad Affiliate Program work?
settings.answer: Sign up, set up your profile, and add your payment details. Share your unique HOK Squad referral link or code with your followers on Instagram, YouTube, or anywhere you like! Every time someone shops on hokmakeup.com through your link, you earn a commission. The more your community shops, the more you earn.

settings.question: How do I earn in this program?
settings.answer: You earn a fixed commission on every successful purchase made through your referral link or promo code. Plus, if your referrals join HOK Squad too, you unlock even more bonuses through our referral chain benefits.

settings.question: How do I join?
settings.answer: Just click Sign Up on the HOK Squad page and complete the onboarding steps!
